scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Side a: outside of tape says that it is not connected to interview; discusses problems with the inflated prices of the town and the speaker's views on America and colored people; February 16th is mentioned; uses numerous racial slurs; and discusses views on politics, most specifically judges. Side b: HBA looks back on his life living in a steel mining town in Michigan; reflects on time right after Stock Market crash, during Prohibition and Great Depression; describes the social aspects of living in this town; and describes the types of jobs needed to run a steel mill and some processes they use.
